EmailTemplate.name: AU Motorpass - Individual Confirmation New
EmailTemplate.subject: We have your Motorpass application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.FirstName}
Thank you for completing a Motorpass application.
We will contact you within three business days. Our aim will be to advance your application without delay.
In the meantime, should you have any questions, please call us on 1300 722 525 or visit us online at motorpass.com.au
Yours sincerely Greg Drumm Managing Director WEX Australia
